changePosition(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Function can be used to extend or reduce a position. Reversing a position is prohibited.

params.amount: Amount in vQuote (if LONG) or vBase (if SHORT) to sell. 18 decimals
params.direction: Whether the trader wants to go in the LONG or SHORT direction overall
params.isLiquidation: Transaction is a liquidation (true) or a regular transaction (false)
params.minAmount: Minimum amount that the user is willing to accept. 18 decimals

params.account: Address to get the LP position from
Address to get the LP position from
Address to get the pnL from

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

params.account: Address to get the trading position from
Address to get the pnL from

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

pause().details: Can only be called by Emergency Admin

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.amounts: Amount of virtual tokens ([vQuote, vBase]) provided. 18 decimals
params.minLpAmount: Minimum amount of Lp tokens minted. 18 decimals

returns.tradingFees: Generated profit generated from trading fees

params.account: Account of the LP to remove liquidity from
params.isLiquidation: Transaction is a liquidation (true) or a regular transaction (false)
params.liquidityAmountToRemove: Amount of liquidity to be removed from the pool. 18 decimals
params.minAmount: Minimum amount that the user is willing to accept, in vQuote if LONG, in vBase if SHORT. 18 decimals
params.minVTokenAmounts: Minimum amount of virtual tokens [vQuote, vBase] to withdraw from the curve pool. 18 decimals
params.proposedAmount: Amount of tokens to be sold, in vBase if LONG, in vQuote if SHORT. 18 decimals

removeLiquiditySwap(address,uint256,uint.details: Used to compute the proposedAmount parameter needed for removing liquidityTo be statically called from `ClearingHouseViewer.removeLiquiditySwap`

params.direction: If Long, vQuote should be traded for vBase otherwise vBase should be traded for vQuote
params.liquidityAmountToRemove: Amount of liquidity to be removed from the pool. 18 decimals
params.minVTokenAmounts: Minimum amount of virtual tokens [vQuote, vBase] to withdraw from the curve pool. 18 decimals
params.proposedAmount: Amount of tokens to be sold, in vBase if LONG, in vQuote if SHORT. 18 decimals
params.withCurveTradingFees: Whether or not Curve trading fees should be included

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,i.details: Can only be called by Governance

unpause().details: Can only be called by Emergency Admin

updateGlobalState().details: Can be called by offchain worker to update market conditions

PRBMathSD59x18__AbsInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when the input is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__DivInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when one of the inputs is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__DivOverflow(uint256).notice: Emitted when one of the intermediary unsigned results overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when one of the inputs is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulOverflow(uint256).notice: Emitted when the intermediary absolute result overflows SD59x18.

PRBMath__MulDivFixedPointOverflow(uint25.notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

PRBMath__MulDivOverflow(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

Perpetual_AttemptReducePosition().notice: Emitted when the user attempts to reduce their position using extendPosition

Perpetual_AttemptReversePosition().notice: Emitted when the user attempts to reverse their position using changePosition

Perpetual_ExcessiveBlockTradeAmount().notice: Emitted when the price impact of a position is too high

Perpetual_InsuranceFeeInvalid(int256).notice: Emitted when the proposed insurance fee is insufficient/excessive

Perpetual_InvalidAdminFee().notice: Emitted when the curve admin fee is invalid

Perpetual_LPOpenPosition().notice: Emitted when the liquidity provider has an open position

Perpetual_LPWithdrawExceedsBalance().notice: Emitted when the user attempts to withdraw more liquidity than they have deposited

Perpetual_LockPeriodInvalid(uint256).notice: Emitted when the proposed lp lock period is insufficient/excessive

Perpetual_LockPeriodNotReached(uint256).notice: Emitted when the user attempts remove liquidity too early

Perpetual_LpAmountDeviation().notice: Emitted when the user attempts provide liquidity with skewed ratios

Perpetual_LpDebtCoefInvalid(int256).notice: Emitted when the proposed lp debt coefficient is insufficient/excessive

Perpetual_MarketBalanceTooLow().notice: Emitted when a token balance of the market is lte 1

Perpetual_MaxBlockAmountInvalid(uint256).notice: Emitted when the proposed maximum block trade amount is insufficient

Perpetual_MaxLiquidityProvided().notice: Emitted when the max tvl is reached

Perpetual_MaxPositionSize().notice: Emitted when the position exceeds the max position size

Perpetual_NoOpenPosition().notice: Emitted when the user does not have an open position

Perpetual_RiskWeightInvalid(uint256).notice: Emitted when the proposed market risk weight is insufficient/excessive

Perpetual_SenderNotClearingHouse().notice: Emitted when the sender is not the clearing house

Perpetual_SenderNotClearingHouseOwner().notice: Emitted when the sender is not the clearing house owner

Perpetual_SensitivityInvalid(int256).notice: Emitted when the proposed funding rate sensitivity is insufficient/excessive

Perpetual_TwapFrequencyInvalid(uint256).notice: Emitted when the proposed twap frequency is insufficient/excessive

Perpetual_VirtualTokenApprovalConstructo.notice: Emitted when the constructor fails to give approval of a virtual token to the market

Perpetual_ZeroAddressConstructor(uint256.notice: Emitted when the zero address is provided as a parameter in the constructor

FundingPaid(address,int256,int256,int256.notice: Emitted when funding payments are exchanged for a trader / lp

FundingRateUpdated(int256,int256).notice: Emitted when funding rate is updated

Log(string).notice: Emitted when swap with cryptoswap pool fails

changePosition(address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Open or increase or reduce a position, either LONG or SHORT

getLpFundingPayments(address).notice: Get the approximate funding payments for a LP

getLpLiquidity(address).notice: Get the lp tokens owned by a Liquidity Provider

getLpOpenNotional(address).notice: Get the dollar value of the liquidity provided by a liquidity Provider

getLpPosition(address).notice: Get the position of a liquidity provider

getLpPositionAfterWithdrawal(address).notice: Get the (active) position of a liquidity provider after withdrawing liquidity

getLpTradingFees(address).notice: Get the trading fees earned by a LP

getLpUnrealizedPnL(address).notice: Get the unrealized profit and loss of a LP

getPendingPnL(address).notice: Get the Profit and Loss of a user

getTotalLiquidityProvided().notice: Get the market total liquidity provided to the Crypto Swap pool

getTraderFundingPayments(address).notice: Get the approximate funding payments for a trader

getTraderPosition(address).notice: Get the position of a trader

getTraderUnrealizedPnL(address).notice: Get the unrealized profit and loss of a trader

getUserDebt(address).notice: Get the user debt of an user

indexPrice().notice: Return the current off-chain exchange rate for vBase/vQuote

insuranceFee().notice: paid on dollar value of an opened position (used in ClearingHouse)

isLpPositionOpen(address).notice: Whether or not a LP position is opened

isTraderPositionOpen(address).notice: Whether a trader position is opened or not

lockPeriod().notice: time when the liquidity provision has to be locked

marketPrice().notice: Return the last traded price (used for TWAP)

marketTwap().notice: Market Time-weighted average price of base

maxBlockTradeAmount().notice: max trade amount in one block

maxLiquidityProvided().notice: maximum liquidity which can be provided to the pool

oracleTwap().notice: Oracle Time-weighted average price of base

removeLiquiditySwap(address,uint256,uint.notice: Simulate removing liquidity from the curve pool to increase the slippage         and then performs a single swap on the curve pool. Returns the proceeds from the trade with revert message

riskWeight().notice: risk weight of the perpetual pair

sensitivity().notice: funding rate sensitivity to price deviations

settleLp(address).notice: Settle funding payments for a liquidity providerUpdate the cumulative funding rate for the LP and return pending funding payments

settleTrader(address).notice: Settle funding payments for a traderUpdate the cumulative funding rate for the trader and return pending funding payments

twapFrequency().notice: period over which twap is calculated

updateGlobalState().notice: Update the global state of the perpetual market

userdoc.notice: Handle all the logic involving the pool. Interact with the CryptoSwap pool
